tit.j: 天理市立黒塚古墳展示館

sen.j: 天理市立 黒塚古墳展示館（てんりしりつ くろづかこふんてんじかん）は奈良県天理市にある博物館。
sen.e: Tenri Municipal Kurozuka Tumulus Museum is a museum in Tenri City, Nara Prefecture.
Tenri Municipal Kurozuka Tumulus Museum is a museum in Tenri City, Nara Prefecture.
Tenri Municipal Kurozuka Tumulus Museum is a museum in Tenri City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 古墳時代初期の前方後円墳である黒塚古墳から1998年に国内最多の三角縁神獣鏡33面、画文帯神獣鏡1面、大量の鉄製刀剣類、U字形の鉄製品などが出土した。
sen.e: In 1998, a national record of 33 Sankakubuchi Shinjukyo Mirror (a round mirror with raised edge and relief engraving of animals and gods) along with one Gabuntai Shinjukyo Mirror (a mirror with figures of deities and sacred animals,) numerous iron swords, and U-shaped iron products were excavated from Kurozuka Tumulus, a keyhole-shaped mound built in the beginning of the Kofun period (tumulus period.)

In 1998, a national record of 33 Sankakubuchi Shinjukyo Mirror (a round mirror with raised edge and relief engraving of animals and gods) along with one Gabuntai Shinjukyo Mirror (a mirror with figures of deities and sacred animals), numerous iron swords, and U-shaped iron products were excavated from Kurozuka Tumulus, a keyhole-shaped mound built in the beginning of the Kofun period (tumulus period).
sen.cmt: コンマ、ピリオド位置を低セしました。
sen.e: In 1998, a national record of 33 Sankakubuchi Shinjukyo Mirror (a round mirror with raised edge and relief engraving of animals and gods) along with one Gabuntai Shinjukyo Mirror (a mirror with figures of deities and sacred animals), numerous iron swords, and U-shaped iron products were excavated from Kurozuka Tumulus, a keyhole-shaped mound built in the beginning of the Kofun period (tumulus period).

sen.j: これらの考古学資料を保管・展示するために天理市により黒塚古墳の周濠だったと考えられる池の東畔の公園内に開設された施設である。
sen.e: Tenri City opened the museum in a park located on the eastern bank of a pond which is considered to have been the surrounding moat of Kurozuka Tumulus, in order to keep and display the archaeological materials found.

Tenri City opened the museum in a park located on the eastern bank of a pond which is considered to have been the surrounding moat of Kurozuka Tumulus, in order to keep and display the archaeological materials found.

Tenri City opened the museum in a park located on the eastern bank of a pond which is considered to have been the surrounding moat of Kurozuka Tumulus, in order to keep and display the archaeological materials found.

sen.j: 館内は、1階の吹き抜け下に黒塚古墳の石室が原寸大（長さ8.3m）模型で再現されている。
sen.e: At the open ceiling space on the first floor, the rock chamber of Kurozuka Tumulus is reproduced at full scale (8.3 meters long.)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: At the open ceiling space on the first floor, the rock chamber of Kurozuka Tumulus is reproduced at full scale (8.3 meters long.)
At the open ceiling space on the first floor, the rock chamber of Kurozuka Tumulus is reproduced at full scale (8.3 meters long.)

sen.j: 2階の吹き抜け上から1階の石室全体を見渡すことができるようになっている。
sen.e: From the open hall on the second floor, you can overlook the whole rock chamber model below.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: From the open hall on the second floor, you can overlook the whole rock chamber model below.
From the open hall on the second floor, you can overlook the whole rock chamber model below.

sen.j: ほか1階では鉄器など黒塚古墳出土品を展示して古墳時代の大和と黒塚古墳についてパネルで紹介している。
sen.e: On the first floor, there is also a display of artifacts, such as ironware, excavated from Kurozuka Tumulus with explanation panels to describe Kurozuka Tumulus as well as Yamato during the Kofun period (tumulus period.)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: On the first floor, there is also a display of artifacts, such as ironware, excavated from Kurozuka Tumulus with explanation panels to describe Kurozuka Tumulus as well as Yamato during the Kofun period (tumulus period).
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: On the first floor, there is also a display of artifacts, such as ironware, excavated from Kurozuka Tumulus with explanation panels to describe Kurozuka Tumulus as well as Yamato during the Kofun period (tumulus period).

sen.j: 2階では出土した三角縁神獣鏡33面、画文帯神獣鏡1面の精巧なレプリカを展示している。
sen.e: On the second floor, accurate replicas of excavated artifacts, 33 Sankakubuchi Shinjukyo Mirror and one Gabuntai Shinjukyo Mirror, are displayed.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: On the second floor, accurate replicas of excavated artifacts, 33 Sankakubuchi Shinjukyo Mirror and one Gabuntai Shinjukyo Mirror, are displayed.
On the second floor, accurate replicas of excavated artifacts, 33 Sankakubuchi Shinjukyo Mirror and one Gabuntai Shinjukyo Mirror, are displayed.

sen.j: なお本物の鏡は保存処理を施された上、保管されている。
sen.e: The original mirrors are stored after a treatment for preservation.
The original mirrors are stored after a treatment for preservation.
The original mirrors are stored after a treatment for preservation.

sen.cmt: 他文書と統一してください

sen.j: 休館日 - 祝日・月曜（月曜が祝日の場合はその翌日も休館。）
sen.e: Closed on national holidays & Mondays (If a national holiday falls on a Monday, the museum will be closed on the following Tuesday as well.)
sen.cmt: 他文書と統一してください
sen.e: Close: National holidays and Mondays (If a national holiday falls on a Monday, the museum will be closed on the following Tuesday as well.)
Close: National holidays and Mondays (If a national holiday falls on a Monday, the museum will be closed on the following Tuesday as well.)

sen.cmt: 他文書と統一してください

sen.j: 桜井線 柳本駅 徒歩5分
sen.e: 5 minutes walk from Yanagimoto Station (Sakurai Line)
sen.cmt: 他文書と統一してください
sen.e: 5 minutes walk from Yanagimoto Station (Sakurai Line)
5 minutes walk from Yanagimoto Station (Sakurai Line)
